Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by West Texas in 1961...
Injured on 4/23/1964 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/28/1966 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 7/5/1966 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/11/1967...
Had first career hit on 8/9/1967, off Lee Maus (LP)...
Injured on 5/15/1969 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 8/18/1970, off Francis Miyamoto (TRO)...
Injured on 7/23/1972 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Northeastern on 2/3/1973 to a 3-year deal worth $1,200,000 per year...
Injured on 5/24/1977 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 2-3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/4/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $994,400 per year...
Injured on 8/14/1981 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
